'''Josh 'rockenroll4life' Letellier''' is a former member of the ''[[Minecraft: Java Edition]]'' development team at [[Mojang Studios]] from July 16, 2018,<ref>{{Tweet|rockenroll4life|1016896738760671232|Oh boy, am I excited. I'll be flying over to Stockholm this Saturday and should hopefully be starting sometime soon after that. #Hype! I look forward to exploring the city and starting work on the Java edition of @Minecraft! :D|July 11, 2018}}</ref><ref>{{Tweet|rockenroll4life|1018755187249381377|Ah ha! Found it! @Mojang|July 16, 2018}}</ref> to April 10, 2019. Previously, he worked at the Minecraft Redmond office.

He also owns a YouTube account [https://www.youtube.com/user/rockenroll4life rockenroll4life] where he uploads Minecraft Let's Plays.

On April 10, 2019, Letellier announced his intended-to-be-temporary departure from Mojang as his residency/work extension was denied by the Swedish Migration Agency.<ref>{{tweet|rockenroll4life|1115902582101356545|<nowiki>[1/2]</nowiki> Hey Everyone, It comes with heavy heart that I have to announce that due to complications with Swedish Migrations my residency/work extension was denied and I'm no longer able to work in Sweden or at Mojang for the time being. (Unless some miracle happens)|April 10, 2019}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|rockenroll4life|1115902616884666373|<nowiki>[2/2]</nowiki> While I may be flying back to the states soon fear not! I hope to return again to the Java team if/when I'm allowed to in the not too distant future! I'm not a quitter! I still got stuff I want to get added and do in Minecraft!|April 10, 2019}}</ref>
